outputs Package¶

ioutput Module¶

Created on Aug 5, 2012

@author: Gary

class housemonitor.outputs.ioutput.iOutput[source]¶

Bases: lib.base.Base

This is an abstract class for outputting data.

output(value, data, listeners)[source]¶

This routine will be called to convert value from one unit to another such as Centigrade to Fahrenheit.

Args:

value: is the value to convert listeners: are the routines that this value will go through being processed data: a dictionary containing more information about the

value. Data can be added to this as needed. Here is a list of values that will be in the data dictionary:

date_time_received: time when value was received. Units: units of the number Name: name assigned to the value etc.
